forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Partial clearing late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 57F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
